para.preformatted: size_t xStreamBufferReceiveFromISR( StreamBufferHandle_t xStreamBuffer, void *pvRxData, size_t xBufferLengthBytes, BaseType_t *pxHigherPriorityTaskWoken );

detaileddescription.para: An interrupt safe version of the API function that receives bytes from a stream buffer.
Use xStreamBufferReceive() to read bytes from a stream buffer from a task. Use xStreamBufferReceiveFromISR() to read bytes from a stream buffer from an interrupt service routine (ISR).
